text: Ne olwa mwabukula indakano , nenikhubaninilia hekulu olukulu, Bukule akakhwabahelesia nende amaani mana muwulile, nibaboola mbu “khuwulile mana khulobele” mana nibanywesibwa mumioyo chiabu (okhulama) eshimwosi, khulwa okhukhaya khwabu, boola “nobubii buliburie buno bwobusuubili bwenyu bubalomesinjia toto nimuli abasuubili”
